璅字的基本解释

璅
zǎo
像玉的美石。

璅
suǒ
古同“琐”：“谰言兼存，璅语必录。”

璅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suǒ］
［《集韻》損果切，上果，心。］
同“瑣1”。
(1)同“瑣”。
(2)通“鎖”。

璅字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璅； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页741第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?子晧切，音早。【說文】石之似玉者。　又【集韻】損果切【正韻】蘇果切，?音?。玉聲也。與瑣同。　又門鏤也。【屈原·離騷】欲少留此靈璅兮。【註】靈璅，謂楚宮，不敢斥言君，猶後代稱陛下之意。　又小也。【張衡·東京賦】旣璅璅焉。【註】璅璅，小也。　又猥屑意。【晉書·習鑿齒傳】璅璅常流離。

【正字通】瑣本字。
璅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璅字的起名意思

像玉的美石。

璅
Basic explanation of words
璅
zǎo
Beautiful stone like jade.
璅
suǒ
The ancient same "Sorry": "The slander can exist at the same time, and the remarks must be recorded."
璅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suǒ］
["Jiyun" damages the fruit and cuts, the fruit is on, the heart. ]
Same as "Sorry 1".
(1) Same as "Suo".
(2) Through "lock".
璅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璅; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 741 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Zi Hao cut, the sound is early. [Said the text] The stone is like jade.　[Jiyun] Losing Guoqie [Zhengyun] Su Guoqi, "Yin". Yusheng also. Same with Zoo.　And the door is carved out. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] If you want to stay in this spirit for less. [Note] Lingjing, the palace of Chu, dare not scold the monarch, but the future generations are called your majesty.　It's small. [Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] 痣璅璅焉. [Note] Jingrong, Xiaoye.　It's crumbly. 【Book of Jin·The Biography of Chiao Teeth】It is often drifting away. 【Zhengzitong】Suobenzi.
璅
